content.text:
# Draft:Battle of Tabanyama

The Battle of Tabanyama took place from 19 January 1900 to 22 January during the Second Boer War between the forces of Generals Louis Botha and Buller. This battle was followed by the Battle of Spioenkop.
References
* The War Reporter. J.E.H. Grobler. Jonathan Ball Publishers. 2004.
